product_name: REI USB Multi-Nation Travel Adaptor Plug
long_description: The REI USB Multi-Nation Travel Adaptor Plug eliminates the need to carry multiple adapter plugs. It's design features a universal receptacle that accepts nearly any appliance's plug configuration. Adapts itself to the 4 most common plug configurations for 100V to 240V used in over 150 countries. Also includes a 500mA USB charging port to charge a mobile phone, tablet, laptop, camera or other device. 6 amp maximum works with a variety of appliances (excluding hair dryers).
short_description: The REI USB Multi-Nation Travel Adaptor Plug eliminates the need to carry multiple adapter plugs. It's design features a universal receptacle that accepts nearly any appliance's plug configuration.
